mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (strategy_id, version, exchange, coin_unit, base_unit, cash_unit, cash , test_start, test_end , name, description, author_id, test_result) VALUES (${strategyId}, ${version}, #{exchange}, #{coinUnit}, #{baseUnit}, #{cashUnit}, ${cash}, ${testStart}, ${testEnd}, #{name}, #{description}, #{authorId}, #{testResult} )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id , a.strategy_id , a.version , a.exchange , a.coin_unit , a.base_unit , a.name , a.description , a.cash , a.cash_unit , a.is_display , a.test_start , a.test_end , a.test_result , a.author_id , a.create_time , a.task_ecs_id , a.timezone , a.public_invest_id , ifnull(b.invest_cash, 0) as invest_cash , a.is_executing
, c.invest_id
FROM goods a LEFT JOIN (SELECT aa.id , aa.goods_id , sum(aa.invest_cash) as invest_cash FROM invest_goods aa WHERE aa.goods_id = ${id} AND aa.is_finished = false GROUP BY aa.goods_id ) b ON a.id = b.goods_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT bb.goods_id , bb.id as invest_id FROM invest_goods bb WHERE bb.user_id = #{userId} AND bb.is_finished = false GROUP BY bb.goods_id ) c on a.id = c.goods_id
WHERE a.id = ${id}
SELECT b.user_id FROM goods a JOIN invest_goods b on a.id = b.goods_id WHERE a.id = #{param1} AND a.is_finished = false

SELECT id , strategy_id , version , exchange , coin_unit , base_unit , description , is_display , create_time , test_start , test_end , cash , cash_unit , name , author_id , test_result , create_time , task_ecs_id FROM goods WHERE 1=1 AND ${column} in (#{val})

SELECT ifnull(a.cum_returns, 0) as cum_returns , b.monthly , ifnull(if(b.monthly = (SELECT date_format(create_time, '%Y%m') FROM invest_goods WHERE id = #{param1} ) , ( SELECT prev_equity FROM performance_daily WHERE invest_id = #{param1} AND date = 'START' ) , ( SELECT equity FROM performance_daily WHERE invest_id = #{param1} AND date = REPLACE(LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(b.monthly, '01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)), '-', ''))) , 0) as prev_equity FROM ( ( SELECT d.cum_returns , SUBSTR(d.date, 1, 6) as monthly , d.prev_equity , d.date FROM performance_daily d WHERE invest_id = #{param1} AND ( REPLACE(LAST_DAY(d.`date`), '-', '') = d.date OR REPLACE(SUBSTR(now(), 1,10), '-', '') = d.date ) GROUP BY d.date ) UNION DISTINCT ( SELECT d.cum_returns , SUBSTR(d.date, 1, 6) as monthly , d.prev_equity , d.date FROM performance_daily d WHERE invest_id = #{param1} GROUP BY d.date LIMIT 1 ) ) a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now() , INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y%m') as monthly UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now() , INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now() , INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now() , INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now() , INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') as date ) b on a.monthly = b.monthly GROUP BY b.monthly ORDER BY monthly
